item.title: Japan (!) now slated to have the highest birthrate in East Asia
item.description:
Mike Bird on Twitter

‚ÄúJapan was once known for ultra-low birthrates. Though still low, it now actually has the highest fertility rate in developed E. Asia, and is tied with China, where fertility is still tumbling. Not having a 20x house-price/income may help. https://t.co/dgu7pnTwdF‚Äù

URL: https://twitter.com/Birdyword/status/1527321785532055552
